sheep.collision
Class Flat

java.lang.Object
  sheep.collision.Flat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Spatial
public class Flat
extends java.lang.Object
implements Spatial

Implements a "flat" partitioning as a reference. If there aren't that many objects in the scene, this is probably faster than a QuadTree.

Method Detail

clear

public void clear()
Description copied from interface: Spatial
Clears all sprites from the structure. When rebuilding the structure, it is usually more efficient to clear the elements than to reallocate the entire structure.

Specified by:
clear in interface Spatial

insert

public void insert(Sprite sprite)
Description copied from interface: Spatial
Inserts a Sprite into the structure. How a Sprite is inserted is up the subclass, and may be based on information found in the Sprite, like its BoundingBox.

Specified by:
insert in interface Spatial
Parameters:
sprite - The Sprite to insert.

visit

public void visit(SpatialVisitor visitor,
                  BoundingBox box)
Description copied from interface: Spatial
Visits all Sprites which intersect a certain area.

Specified by:
visit in interface Spatial
Parameters:
visitor - The visitor callback.
box - The BoundingBox for the area of interest.
